Celtic defender Josip Juranovic made his first start at the World Cup this morning, playing the entire 90 minutes of a 0-0 Croatia draw against Morocco.
It was a frustrating day for the Croatians wh… [+2114 chars]

articles.title: How deliberate Aston interference helped Alfa Romeo's $11m bid - The Race
articles.description: Alfa Romeo had little hope of scoring points in the Abu Dhabi GP. Instead, it went for spoiler tactics to hinder the Aston Martin F1 drivers.
articles.content: Alfa Romeo may have only hung onto sixth in the Formula 1 constructors championship by the skin of its teeth after Aston Martin finished level on points, but the teams novel strategic approach, focus… [+7651 chars]

articles.description: Ipswich Town were knocked out of the Papa John's Trophy by Portsmouth last night. Andy Warren shares his thoughts on the game.

articles.title: Bolton Wanderers 3-2 Barrow - Kachunga winner in Papa Johns Trophy - The Bolton News
articles.description: Substitute Elias Kachunga grabbed the winner for Wanderers to send them through to the last 16 in the Papa Johns Trophy.
articles.content:
Wanderers are only a few steps from Wembley again all thanks to an unlikely goalscoring hero.
